016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.component;
017
018import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.TestContract;
019import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.ParameterizedInstantiator;
020import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.property.PropertySupport;
021import de.cuioss.tools.logging.CuiLogger;
022import jakarta.faces.component.UIComponent;
023import jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext;
024import lombok.Getter;
025import org.apache.myfaces.test.el.MockValueExpression;
026
027import java.util.List;
028
029import static de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings.emptyToNull;
030import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
031
032/**
033 * Tests all given properties according to the given List of
034 * {@link ComponentPropertyMetadata}
035 *
036 * @param <T> The Rule does not apply to annotations: There is no inheritance
037 * @author Oliver Wolff
038 */
039public class ValueExpressionPropertyContract<T extends UIComponent> implements TestContract<T> {
040
041    /**
042     * Wraps textual names to EL-expressions.
043     */
044    @SuppressWarnings("el-syntax")
045    public static final String EL_WRAPPER = "#{%s}";
046    /**
047     * String constant used for checking if a given String is EL-Expression.
048     */
049    @SuppressWarnings("el-syntax")
050    public static final String EL_START = "#{";
051    private static final CuiLogger log = new CuiLogger(ValueExpressionPropertyContract.class);
052    private static final String NAME_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "Name must not be null";
053    @Getter
054    private final ParameterizedInstantiator<T> instantiator;
055    private final List<ComponentPropertyMetadata> filteredMetadata;
056    private final FacesContext facesContext;
057
058    /**
059     * @param instantiator
060     * @param metadatas
061     * @param facesContext
062     */
063    public ValueExpressionPropertyContract(final ParameterizedInstantiator<T> instantiator,
064                                           final List<ComponentPropertyMetadata> metadatas, final FacesContext facesContext) {
065        this.instantiator = instantiator;
066        filteredMetadata = metadatas.stream().filter(m -> !m.isIgnoreOnValueExpresssion()).toList();
067        this.facesContext = facesContext;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * In case the beanKey is not an el expression (starting not with '#{') this
072     * method wraps the expression accordingly.
073     *
074     * @param managedBeanKey must not be null or empty
075     * @return the key wrapped as an EL-Expression if needed, otherwise the given
076     * key.
077     */
078    private static String checkManagedBeanKey(final String managedBeanKey) {
079        requireNonNull(emptyToNull(managedBeanKey), NAME_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
080        var elKey = managedBeanKey;
081        if (!elKey.startsWith(EL_START)) {
082            elKey = EL_WRAPPER.formatted(elKey);
083        }
084        return elKey;
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public void assertContract() {
089        var names = filteredMetadata.stream().map(ComponentPropertyMetadata::getName).toList();
090        log.info("Verifying " + getClass().getName() + "\nWith properties: " + String.join(" ", names));
091
092        checkGetterAndSetterContract();
093    }
094
095    private void checkGetterAndSetterContract() {
096        final var supportList = filteredMetadata.stream().map(PropertySupport::new).toList();
097        final UIComponent target = getInstantiator().newInstanceMinimal();
098
099        for (final PropertySupport support : supportList) {
100            var expression = new MockValueExpression(checkManagedBeanKey(support.getName()),
101                support.getPropertyMetadata().resolveActualClass());
102            target.setValueExpression(support.getName(), expression);
103            expression.setValue(facesContext.getELContext(), support.generateTestValue());
104
105            support.assertValueSet(target);
106        }
107    }
108}
